Last year when I visited Apple in Silicon Valley, I invited Tim Cook to Turkey. He came to see me today.
I invited Tim Cook to Turkey during my visit to Apple in Silicon Valley last year. He visited me today.
We had a nice conversation about the future of information technology.
We had a nice chat on the future of information technologies.
I wanted Apple to rely on the future of Turkey and increase its visibility in Turkey, especially in R & D.
I assured him that Apple can count on Turkey's future and it will increase their visibility in Turkey, especially in R & D field
Tim Cook told me that they would be very interested in the stores they will open in Istanbul in April and that they will attract a lot of attention outside.
Tim Cook is telling me how he will work on the App Store.
